Opryland USA was an amusement park located in suburban Nashville, 
Tennessee. It operated seasonally (generally March to October) from 1972 to 
1997, and for a special Christmas-themed engagement every December from 
1993 to 1997. During the late 1980s, nearly 2.5 million people visited the park 
annually. ... In 1979, Opryland added the Roy Acuff Theater, named after the
